channel.title: Ok... I'm having some problems that are really pissing me off
channel.description:
Whenever I make my own server, and play... These things happen:
Whenever I get a Fire Cape or a Berserker Ring, it freezes, disconnects me. When I go back online, I can't move, and then after a while it disconnects me again so I have to make a new account. I bet there's more items that do that.
So I make a new account and I play and log off, but after 4 times of logging in with one of my characters and log in again... ALL MY THINGS HAVE VANISHED AND I'M WHERE I STARTED OFF AGAIN... :confused:
So I'm here typing this after what I've gone through... HELP MII PL0X!!!! :D

@dragonus18 wrote:

mmk but just os you know no private server is and never will be perfect

item.title: Ok... I'm having some problems that are really pissing me off
item.dc:creator: @Original_MIB Original_MIB
item.description:
@Original_MIB wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:7, topic:127815”]how about you stop whining and live with it? we all know moparscape isn’t perfect but its the best we’ve got. so pleas ejust stop whining and firecape works find when i use it and stuff so idk[/quote]I’m kind of like a 1st comer and I thought it was going to be perfect… :\

But oh well… I’ll just play Runescape I guess…

Read full topic

I need an expert badly… Oh, and… WHY DON’T SPELLS AND SHOOTING ARROWS FROM YOUR BOW DOESN’T WORK!?

item.title: Ok... I'm having some problems that are really pissing me off
item.dc:creator: @Original_MIB Original_MIB
item.description:
@Original_MIB wrote:

[quote=“zammyking111, post:3, topic:127815”][quote author=hmpph link=topic=178453.msg1633330#msg1633330 date=1185629594]
The items your trying to use are not in your Database.
If I were you, I’d just download a “more recent” source.
Cool as.

Also if you want to continue with your current source, go into your servers folder and find the “characters” folder, go into that and edit the items in your players inventory.
[/quote]
Do what he says and try playing on a recent Client to like moparscape’s[/quote]Link plz.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @hmpph hmpph
item.description:
@hmpph wrote:

The items your trying to use are not in your Database.
If I were you, I’d just download a “more recent” source.
Cool as.

Also if you want to continue with your current source, go into your servers folder and find the “characters” folder, go into that and edit the items in your players inventory.
